description:
This comfortable apartment is perfect for a cost effective visit to NYC. One Room a  living area and queen sized bed, Couch, kitchen, and a bathtub/shower combo. 2 blocks away from the subway cultural neighborhood with lots of food! Experience the real New York!

Este cómodo apartamento es perfecto para una visita rentable a Nueva York. Una habitación una sala de estar y cama queen size, sofá, cocina y una combinación de bañera / ducha. 2 cuadras de metro del barrio cultural y Real de NYC!

4 blocks away central park

As the guests required

Harlem is a large neighborhood in the northern section of the New York City borough of Manhattan. Since the 1920s, Harlem has been known as a major  residential, cultural and business center.

6 and 1 Train
name: Central Park-East Harlem. One Bedroom APT
review: Our first visit to NYC was overwhelming. As expected Napos place was a New York style apartment. Small but charming. 5 min walk to central park, 2 min from the metro station an a great coffee dealer. All you need is within walking distance and you get quiet a descent place for the price you pay. Never forget you wont pay for a five star spa hotel but for a great start to explore NYC by foot and public transportation. The apartment had all we needed travelling light. Definately recommended for your stay at New York City!
